variables.label: Timezone

variables.label: Lychee Version
variables.description: Checkout their docker page for the valid tags https://hub.docker.com/r/lycheeorg/lychee/tags

variables.label: User ID
variables.description: User ID that the process uses, run (id $user) in your instance to see the id

variables.label: Group ID
variables.description: Group ID that the process uses, run (id $user) in your instance to see the id

variables.label: Lychee WebUI Port
variables.description: The port used to access Lychee

variables.label: MariaDB Version
variables.description: Checkout their docker page for the valid tags https://hub.docker.com/r/library/mariadb/tags/
